name: Kashi Vishwanath
short_desc: The City of Light where Shiva himself whispers the Taraka Mantra.

name: Somnath
short_desc: The first Jyotirlinga, the eternal shrine that withstood 17 attacks.

name: Mallikarjuna
short_desc: Where Jyotirlinga and Shakti Peetha unite in divine harmony.

name: Mahakaleshwar
short_desc: The Lord of Time, famous for the sacred Bhasma Aarti.

name: Kedarnath
short_desc: The highest of the 12 Jyotirlingas, amidst the mighty Himalayas.

name: Bhimashankar
short_desc: The fierce protector in the lush Sahyadri wildlife sanctuary.

name: Omkareshwar
short_desc: The sacred Om-shaped island with two Jyotirlingas.

name: Trimbakeshwar
short_desc: Source of the Godavari, with the unique three-faced Trimurti Linga.

name: Vaidyanath
short_desc: The Divine Healer, famous for the Kanwar Yatra pilgrimage.

name: Nageshwar
short_desc: The Lord of Serpents near Krishna's sacred city.

name: Rameshwaram
short_desc: Where Rama worshipped Shiva, with 22 sacred wells.

name: Grishneshwar
short_desc: The Lord of Compassion, the 12th and final Jyotirlinga.

name: Tirupati Balaji
short_desc: The richest temple in the world, abode of Lord Venkateswara.
